keyEvents.description: Rayleigh makes his dramatic entrance, blocking Kizaru's attack on Zoro.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the legendary battle between Rayleigh and Kizaru takes place.

keyEvents.description: Rayleigh and Kizaru engage in direct combat, their powers clashing.
keyEvents.significance: Witnesses one of the most significant battles in the Sabaody arc.

keyEvents.description: Bartholomew Kuma makes Zoro disappear, beginning the crew's separation.
keyEvents.significance: This grove becomes the site of one of the most traumatic events for the Straw Hat Pirates - the beginning of their forced separation.

description: Grove 12 is one of the numbered groves in the Sabaody Archipelago. In Episode 404, it becomes the battlefield where the Straw Hats face their greatest defeat as Admiral Kizaru, Sentomaru, and Bartholomew Kuma overwhelm them despite Rayleigh's intervention.
culturalSignificance: This grove marks the end of the Straw Hats' journey together before the time skip, making it one of the most emotionally significant locations in the series.
